Title: Creates the office of financial freedom; permits debt to be purchased and written-down through eminent domain
Summary: Creates the office of financial freedom to assist in the monetization, purchasing, and cancellation of personal debt, including student loan debt; medical debt, home loan debt, auto loan debt, credit card debt, small business loan debt and other consumer debt; permits debt to be purchased and written-down through eminent domain.
LawCode: Add ยง708-a, EDP L; add Art 23 ยง450, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the eminent domain procedure law, in relation to permitting personal debt to be purchased and written-down; and to amend the economic development law, in relation to establishing the office of financial freedom
